attributes.action: STANDARDISE THE CRITERIA FOR OBESITY SURGERY
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I FIT THE CRITERIA FOR GASTRIC BAND SURGERY WITH A BMI OF 38.9 BUT BECAUSE OF FUNDING MY LOCAL PCT ISNT FUNDING ANY OBESITY SURGERY. yET THE GOVERNMENT AND HEALTH OFFICIALS STATE QUITE CORRECTLY THAT OBESE PEOPLE ARE IN DANGER OF VARIOUS DISEASES YET WHEN WE WANT TO DO SOMETHING ABOUT IT EVERY DOOR IS SHUT IN OUR FACES, YES THERE IS THE OPTION OG GOING PRIVATE BUT WHO IN THE MAJORITY HAS SEVERAL THOUSAND POUNDS TO AY FOR IT?
PLEASE SIGN THIS PETITION FOR MORE FUNDING FOR OBESITY SURGERY

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
